name: bulbasaur
flavor_text_entries:
While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are
stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

name: ivysaur
flavor_text_entries:
Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength.
Sunlight also makes the bud on its back
grow larger.

name: venusaur
flavor_text_entries:
Huge amounts of pollen burst from it with the
force of a volcanic eruption. Breathing in too
much of the pollen can cause fainting.

name: charmander
flavor_text_entries:
From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip
of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to
go out.

name: charmeleon
flavor_text_entries:
If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts
intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

name: charizard
flavor_text_entries:
The flame inside its body burns hotter than
3,600 degrees Fahrenheit. When Charizard
roars, that temperature climbs even higher.

name: squirtle
flavor_text_entries:
When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside
its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

name: wartortle
flavor_text_entries:
It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to
maintain its balance while swimming.

name: blastoise
flavor_text_entries:
Water fired from this Pokémon’s central main
cannon has enough power to blast a hole into
a mountain.

name: caterpie
flavor_text_entries:
Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that
enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: metapod
flavor_text_entries:
Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell,
the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a
harsh attack.

name: butterfree
flavor_text_entries:
Once it has opponents trapped in a tornado that
could blow away a 10-ton truck, it finishes them
off with its poisonous scales.

name: weedle
flavor_text_entries:
Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides
in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

name: kakuna
flavor_text_entries:
Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it
may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: beedrill
flavor_text_entries:
Its legs have become poison stingers. It stabs its
prey repeatedly with the stingers on its limbs,
dealing the final blow with the stinger on its rear.

name: pidgey
flavor_text_entries:
Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up
sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: pidgeotto
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies
around its large territory in search of prey.

name: pidgeot
flavor_text_entries:
With its muscular strength now greatly
increased, it can fly continuously for two weeks
without resting.

name: rattata
flavor_text_entries:
Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you
see one, you can be certain that 40 more
live in the area.

name: raticate
flavor_text_entries:
Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers,
so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

name: spearow
flavor_text_entries:
Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around
very fast to protect its territory.

name: fearow
flavor_text_entries:
A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it
senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

name: ekans
flavor_text_entries:
The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it
wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: arbok
flavor_text_entries:
The frightening patterns on its belly have been
studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: pikachu
flavor_text_entries:
When it smashes its opponents with its bolt-
shaped tail, it delivers a surge of electricity
equivalent to a lightning strike.

name: raichu
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon rides on its tail while it uses
its psychic powers to levitate. It attacks with
star-shaped thunderbolts.

name: sandshrew
flavor_text_entries:
It lives in snowy mountains on southern islands.
When a blizzard rolls in, this Pokémon hunkers
down in the snow to avoid getting blown away.

name: sandslash
flavor_text_entries:
Many people climb snowy mountains, hoping to
see the icy spikes of these Pokémon glistening
in the light of dawn.

name: nidoran-f
flavor_text_entries:
A mild-mannered Pokémon that does not like
to fight. Beware—its small horn secretes venom.

name: nidorina
flavor_text_entries:
When resting deep in its burrow, its barbs always
retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

name: nidoqueen
flavor_text_entries:
Tough scales cover the sturdy body of
this Pokémon. It appears that the scales
grow in cycles.

name: nidoran-m
flavor_text_entries:
Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses
danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

name: nidorino
flavor_text_entries:
Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an
enemy with the horn, the impact makes
the poison leak out.

name: nidoking
flavor_text_entries:
Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle.
Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

name: clefairy
flavor_text_entries:
Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular.
However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.

name: clefable
flavor_text_entries:
Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin
drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually
found in quiet places.

name: vulpix
flavor_text_entries:
If you observe its curly hairs through
a microscope, you’ll see small ice
particles springing up.

name: ninetales
flavor_text_entries:
While it will guide travelers who get lost on a
snowy mountain down to the mountain’s base,
it won’t forgive anyone who harms nature.

name: jigglypuff
flavor_text_entries:
By freely changing the wavelength of its voice,
Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to
make any listener sleepy.

name: wigglytuff
flavor_text_entries:
It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate.
In particular, the curl on its forehead has a
texture that’s perfectly heavenly.

name: zubat
flavor_text_entries:
Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as
a sonar used to check for objects in its way.

name: golbat
flavor_text_entries:
It attacks in a stealthy manner,
without warning. Its sharp fangs
are used to bite and to suck blood.

name: oddish
flavor_text_entries:
During the day, it stays in the cold underground
to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

name: gloom
flavor_text_entries:
What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey.
It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

name: vileplume
flavor_text_entries:
The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it
contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: paras
flavor_text_entries:
Burrows under the ground to gnaw on
tree roots. The mushrooms on its back
absorb most of the nutrition.

name: parasect
flavor_text_entries:
The bug host is drained of energy by
the mushroom on its back. The mushroom
appears to do all the thinking.

name: venonat
flavor_text_entries:
Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you
can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

name: venomoth
flavor_text_entries:
The powdery scales on its wings are hard to
remove from skin. They also contain poison
that leaks out on contact.

name: diglett
flavor_text_entries:
Its three hairs change shape depending on
Diglett’s mood. They’re a useful communication
tool among these Pokémon.

name: dugtrio
flavor_text_entries:
These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea
level. No one knows what it’s like underground.

name: meowth
flavor_text_entries:
These daring Pokémon have coins on their
foreheads. Darker coins are harder, and harder
coins garner more respect among Meowth.

name: persian
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is one tough opponent. Not only
does it have formidable physical abilities, but it’s
also not above fighting dirty.

name: psyduck
flavor_text_entries:
As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets
progressively worse. It uses intense psychic
energy to overwhelm those around it.

name: golduck
flavor_text_entries:
Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that
defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into
the water and taken away.

name: mankey
flavor_text_entries:
An agile Pokémon that lives in trees. It angers
easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

name: primeape
flavor_text_entries:
It stops being angry only when nobody else
is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

name: growlithe
flavor_text_entries:
Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any
opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

name: arcanine
flavor_text_entries:
A Pokémon that has long been admired for its
beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: poliwag
flavor_text_entries:
In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will
cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act
like a suction cup.

name: poliwhirl
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When
captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’
grasp and escape.

name: poliwrath
flavor_text_entries:
Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial
arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out
powerful punches.

name: abra
flavor_text_entries:
Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently
the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its
teleportations go.

name: kadabra
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon’s telekinesis is immensely powerful.
To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up
psychic energy in the star on its forehead.

name: alakazam
flavor_text_entries:
Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. It’s said
that this Pokémon used these powers to create
the spoons it holds.

name: machop
flavor_text_entries:
Always brimming with power, it passes time by
lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

name: machoke
flavor_text_entries:
Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps
people by doing work such as the moving of
heavy goods.

name: machamp
flavor_text_entries:
With four arms that react more quickly than it
can think, it can execute many punches at once.

name: bellsprout
flavor_text_entries:
Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares
tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

name: weepinbell
flavor_text_entries:
When hungry, it swallows anything that moves.
Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.

name: victreebel
flavor_text_entries:
Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey.
Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day,
bones and all.

name: tentacool
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is mostly made of water.
A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to
spot, because its body blends in with the sea.

name: tentacruel
flavor_text_entries:
Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely.
Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out
tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch.

name: geodude
flavor_text_entries:
Its stone head is imbued with electricity and
magnetism. If you carelessly step on one,
you’ll be in for a painful shock.

name: graveler
flavor_text_entries:
When it comes rolling down a mountain path,
anything in its way gets zapped by electricity
and sent flying.

name: golem
flavor_text_entries:
Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender
and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s
exposed to air.

name: ponyta
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon will look into your eyes and read
the contents of your heart. If it finds evil there,
it promptly hides away.

name: rapidash
flavor_text_entries:
The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it
decides the herd’s pace and direction of travel.

name: slowpoke
flavor_text_entries:
When this Pokémon’s tail is soaked in water,
sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait
to lure in and fish up other Pokémon.

name: slowbro
flavor_text_entries:
If this Pokémon squeezes the tongue of the
Shellder biting it, the Shellder will launch a toxic
liquid from the tip of its shell.

name: magnemite
flavor_text_entries:
It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it
emits electromagnetic waves from the units on
each side of its body.

name: magneton
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is constantly putting out a powerful
magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when
a Magneton approaches.

name: farfetchd
flavor_text_entries:
They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all
of them use it in the same way. Several distinct
styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

name: doduo
flavor_text_entries:
Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this
Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: dodrio
flavor_text_entries:
One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form
a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph
in prairies.

name: seel
flavor_text_entries:
Loves freezing-cold conditions.
Relishes swimming in a frigid climate
of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: dewgong
flavor_text_entries:
Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by
even intense cold, it swims powerfully
in icy waters.

name: grimer
flavor_text_entries:
Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid
to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

name: muk
flavor_text_entries:
Smells so awful, it can cause fainting.
Through degeneration of its nose,
it lost its sense of smell.

name: shellder
flavor_text_entries:
Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is
vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: cloyster
flavor_text_entries:
Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to
open, even by those with superior strength.

name: gastly
flavor_text_entries:
With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place
it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

name: haunter
flavor_text_entries:
If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness
when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

name: gengar
flavor_text_entries:
It lays traps, hoping to steal the lives of those it
catches. If you stand in front of its mouth, you’ll
hear your loved ones’ voices calling out to you.

name: onix
flavor_text_entries:
It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by
squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

name: drowzee
flavor_text_entries:
If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes
show you dreams it had eaten in the past.

name: hypno
flavor_text_entries:
Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will
try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

name: krabby
flavor_text_entries:
If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself
with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: kingler
flavor_text_entries:
The bubbles it spews out are strongly alkaline.
Any opponents hit by them will have their bodies
quickly melted away.

name: voltorb
flavor_text_entries:
It is said to camouflage itself as a Poké Ball.
It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

name: electrode
flavor_text_entries:
Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the
slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: exeggcute
flavor_text_entries:
These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a
group of six. The minute even one member of the
group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

name: exeggutor
flavor_text_entries:
When they work together, Exeggutor’s three
heads can put out powerful psychic energy.
Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.

name: cubone
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased
mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry,
but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

name: marowak
flavor_text_entries:
When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its
mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also
turned vicious at the same time.

name: hitmonlee
flavor_text_entries:
The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy
legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

name: hitmonchan
flavor_text_entries:
Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to
need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

name: lickitung
flavor_text_entries:
Bug Pokémon are Lickitung’s main food source.
This Pokémon paralyzes its prey with a lick from
its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.

name: koffing
flavor_text_entries:
It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing
used to be more plentiful in the Galar region
than they are now.

name: weezing
flavor_text_entries:
Long ago, during a time when droves of factories
fouled the air with pollution, Weezing changed
into this form for some reason.

name: rhyhorn
flavor_text_entries:
It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it
starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

name: rhydon
flavor_text_entries:
Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of
living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: chansey
flavor_text_entries:
This species was once very slow. To protect their
eggs from other creatures, these Pokémon
became able to flee quickly.

name: tangela
flavor_text_entries:
The vines of a Tangela have a distinct scent.
In some parts of Galar, Tangela vines are used
as herbs.

name: kangaskhan
flavor_text_entries:
There are records of a lost human child being
raised by a childless Kangaskhan.

name: horsea
flavor_text_entries:
They swim with dance-like motions and cause
whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which
of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

name: seadra
flavor_text_entries:
Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power
is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food
that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.

name: goldeen
flavor_text_entries:
Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed
like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

name: seaking
flavor_text_entries:
Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed
boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from
washing away.

name: staryu
flavor_text_entries:
Fish Pokémon nibble at it, but Staryu isn’t
bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even
if part of it is completely torn off.

name: starmie
flavor_text_entries:
Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed.
As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it
absorbs tiny plankton.

name: mr-mime
flavor_text_entries:
It’s known for its top-notch pantomime skills.
It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by
emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.

name: scyther
flavor_text_entries:
If you come across an area in a forest where a lot
of the trees have been cut down, what you’ve
found is a Scyther’s territory.

name: jynx
flavor_text_entries:
Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it
were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.

name: electabuzz
flavor_text_entries:
If a major power outage occurs, it is certain
that this Pokémon has eaten electricity
at a power plant.

name: magmar
flavor_text_entries:
Born in an active volcano. Its body is
always cloaked in flames, so it looks like
a big ball of fire.

name: pinsir
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon clamps its pincers down on its prey
and then either splits the prey in half or flings
it away.

name: tauros
flavor_text_entries:
The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in
nature, and they won’t allow people to ride on
their backs.

name: magikarp
flavor_text_entries:
This weak and pathetic Pokémon gets easily
pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

name: gyarados
flavor_text_entries:
Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn
everything down, even in a harsh storm.

name: lapras
flavor_text_entries:
It surrounds itself with a huge ring of gathered ice
particles. It uses the ring to smash any icebergs
that might impede its graceful swimming.

name: ditto
flavor_text_entries:
When it encounters another Ditto, it will move
faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

name: eevee
flavor_text_entries:
Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this
special Pokémon conceals many different
possible evolutions.

name: vaporeon
flavor_text_entries:
Its body’s cellular structure is similar to the
molecular composition of water. It can melt
invisibly in water.

name: jolteon
flavor_text_entries:
It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to
blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

name: flareon
flavor_text_entries:
It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal
flame pouch, which heats it to over
3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: porygon
flavor_text_entries:
In recent years, this species has been very helpful
in cyberspace. These Pokémon will go around
checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.

name: omanyte
flavor_text_entries:
An ancient Pokémon that was recovered from
a fossil. It swam by cleverly twisting its
10 tentacles about.

name: omastar
flavor_text_entries:
Its sharp beak rings its mouth. Its shell was too
big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.

name: kabuto
flavor_text_entries:
A Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil.
It used the eyes on its back while hiding
on the seafloor.

name: kabutops
flavor_text_entries:
A slim and fast swimmer. It sliced its prey with
its sharp sickles and drank the body fluids.

name: aerodactyl
flavor_text_entries:
The power of Mega Evolution has completely
restored its genes. The rocks on its body are
harder than diamond.

name: snorlax
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon’s stomach is so strong, even eating
moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

name: articuno
flavor_text_entries:
A legendary bird Pokémon. It freezes water
that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

name: zapdos
flavor_text_entries:
This legendary bird Pokémon is said to
appear when the sky turns dark and lightning
showers down.

name: moltres
flavor_text_entries:
A legendary bird Pokémon. As it flaps its
flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

name: dratini
flavor_text_entries:
Long thought to be a myth, this Pokémon’s
existence was only recently confirmed by a
fisherman who caught one.

name: dragonair
flavor_text_entries:
According to a witness, its body was surrounded
by a strange aura that gave it a mystical look.

name: dragonite
flavor_text_entries:
It is said that this Pokémon lives somewhere
in the sea and that it flies. However, these are
only rumors.

name: mewtwo
flavor_text_entries:
Psychic power has augmented its muscles.
It has a grip strength of one ton and can sprint
a hundred meters in two seconds flat!

name: mew
flavor_text_entries:
When viewed through a microscope, this
Pokémon’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.

name: chikorita
flavor_text_entries:
In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at
bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf,
becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy,
friendly atmosphere all around.

name: bayleef
flavor_text_entries:
Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each
tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this
shoot makes people peppy.

name: meganium
flavor_text_entries:
The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms
emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its
becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.

name: cyndaquil
flavor_text_entries:
Cyndaquil protects itself by flaring up the flames on its back.
The flames are vigorous if the Pokémon is angry. However, if it
is tired, the flames splutter fitfully with incomplete combustion.

name: quilava
flavor_text_entries:
Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames
and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its
outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching
the foe with flames.

name: typhlosion
flavor_text_entries:
Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that
it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates
blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.

name: totodile
flavor_text_entries:
Despite the smallness of its body, Totodile’s jaws are very
powerful. While the Pokémon may think it is just playfully
nipping, its bite has enough power to cause serious injury.

name: croconaw
flavor_text_entries:
Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will
absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are
forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible
to remove when they have sunk in.

name: feraligatr
flavor_text_entries:
Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth.
In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful
hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.

name: sentret
flavor_text_entries:
When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard.
The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When
this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes
incapable of sleep due to fear.

name: furret
flavor_text_entries:
Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly
squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its
short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.

name: hoothoot
flavor_text_entries:
It begins to hoot at the same time every day.
Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.

name: noctowl
flavor_text_entries:
When it needs to think, it rotates its head
180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

name: ledyba
flavor_text_entries:
These very cowardly Pokémon join together and
use Reflect to protect their nest.

name: ledian
flavor_text_entries:
It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly
dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to
you, good things will happen to you.

name: spinarak
flavor_text_entries:
Although the poison from its fangs isn’t that
strong, it’s potent enough to weaken prey that
gets caught in its web.

name: ariados
flavor_text_entries:
It spews threads from its mouth to catch its
prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go
hunt aggressively.

name: crobat
flavor_text_entries:
It feeds on the blood of living people and
Pokémon. If it can’t drink any blood for even a
short while, it becomes weak and unable to fly.

name: chinchou
flavor_text_entries:
On the dark ocean floor, its only means of
communication is its constantly flashing lights.

name: lanturn
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds
its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver
an electrical attack.

name: pichu
flavor_text_entries:
The electric sacs in its cheeks are small. If even a
little electricity leaks, it becomes shocked.

name: cleffa
flavor_text_entries:
Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people
believe that it came here on a meteor.

name: igglybuff
flavor_text_entries:
Taking advantage of the softness of its body,
Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a
deep pink when its temperature rises.

name: togepi
flavor_text_entries:
It is considered to be a symbol of good luck.
Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.

name: togetic
flavor_text_entries:
It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people.
It can float in midair without moving its wings.

name: natu
flavor_text_entries:
Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to
hop to get around. It is always staring
at something.

name: xatu
flavor_text_entries:
This odd Pokémon can see both the past and
the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.

name: mareep
flavor_text_entries:
Rubbing its fleece generates electricity.
You’ll want to pet it because it’s cute, but if you
use your bare hand, you’ll get a painful shock.

name: flaaffy
flavor_text_entries:
It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it
stores up too much, it will start to go bald in
those patches.

name: ampharos
flavor_text_entries:
Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been
prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.

name: bellossom
flavor_text_entries:
Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance.
They say that the dance is a ritual to summon
the sun.

name: marill
flavor_text_entries:
Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water-
repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves
the water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.

name: azumarill
flavor_text_entries:
These Pokémon create air-filled bubbles. When
Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them
with these bubbles.

name: sudowoodo
flavor_text_entries:
It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates
water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

name: politoed
flavor_text_entries:
The cry of a male is louder than that of a female.
Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find
more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: hoppip
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the
approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other
Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.

name: skiploom
flavor_text_entries:
Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises
above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens
depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon
is sometimes used as a thermometer.

name: jumpluff
flavor_text_entries:
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to
foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it
encounters cold air while it is floating.

name: aipom
flavor_text_entries:
It searches for prey from the tops of trees.
When it spots its favorite food, Bounsweet,
Aipom gets excited and pounces.

name: sunkern
flavor_text_entries:
Sunkern tries to move as little as it possibly can. It does so
because it tries to conserve all the nutrients it has stored in its
body for its evolution. It will not eat a thing, subsisting only on
morning dew.

name: sunflora
flavor_text_entries:
Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around
actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as
soon as the sun goes down for the night.

name: yanma
flavor_text_entries:
Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to
move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden
stops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability
to quickly chase down targeted prey.

name: wooper
flavor_text_entries:
When walking on land, it covers its body with a
poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

name: quagsire
flavor_text_entries:
Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head
on the river bottom as it swims but seems not
to care.

name: espeon
flavor_text_entries:
It unleashes psychic power from the orb on its
forehead. When its power is exhausted, the orb
grows dull and dark.

name: umbreon
flavor_text_entries:
On the night of a full moon, or when it gets
excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.

name: murkrow
flavor_text_entries:
It searches for shiny things for its boss.
Murkrow’s presence is said to be unlucky, so
many people detest it.

name: slowking
flavor_text_entries:
Slowking can solve any problem presented to it,
but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.

name: misdreavus
flavor_text_entries:
What makes it happy is imitating the voices of
weeping people and scaring everyone. It doesn’t
deal well with folks who aren’t easily frightened.

name: unown
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as
to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown.
Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

name: wobbuffet
flavor_text_entries:
To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly
in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: girafarig
flavor_text_entries:
Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for
thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it
can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.

name: pineco
flavor_text_entries:
It sticks tree bark to itself with its saliva,
making itself thicker and larger. Elderly Pineco
are ridiculously huge.

name: forretress
flavor_text_entries:
In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the
inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day,
no one has ever seen that sight.

name: dunsparce
flavor_text_entries:
The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels.
They never get lost in their own nests—they can
tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.

name: gligar
flavor_text_entries:
Gligar glides through the air without a sound as if it were
sliding. This Pokémon hangs on to the face of its foe using
its clawed hind legs and the large pincers on its forelegs, then
injects the prey with its poison barb.

name: steelix
flavor_text_entries:
It is thought its body transformed as a result of
iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

name: snubbull
flavor_text_entries:
In contrast to its appearance, it’s quite
timid. When playing with other puppy
Pokémon, it sometimes gets bullied.

name: granbull
flavor_text_entries:
Although it’s popular with young people,
Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally
incompetent as a watchdog.

name: qwilfish
flavor_text_entries:
The small spikes covering its body developed
from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.

name: scizor
flavor_text_entries:
Though its body is slim, Scizor has tremendous
attacking power. Even Scizor’s muscles are made
of metal.

name: shuckle
flavor_text_entries:
The berries stored in its vaselike shell eventually
become a thick, pulpy juice.

name: heracross
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon takes pride in its strength, which
allows it to lift things 100 times heavier than
itself with no trouble at all.

name: sneasel
flavor_text_entries:
It has a cunning yet savage disposition.
It waits for parents to leave their nests,
and then it sneaks in to steal their eggs.

name: teddiursa
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon likes to lick its palms that are sweetened by
being soaked in honey. Teddiursa concocts its own honey
by blending fruits and pollen collected by Beedrill.

name: ursaring
flavor_text_entries:
In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are
many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This
Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.

name: slugma
flavor_text_entries:
Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely
hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body,
carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

name: magcargo
flavor_text_entries:
Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately
18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact.
If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly
turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.

name: swinub
flavor_text_entries:
If it smells something enticing, it dashes off
headlong to find the source of the aroma.

name: piloswine
flavor_text_entries:
Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves
prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.

name: corsola
flavor_text_entries:
These Pokémon live in warm seas.
In prehistoric times, many lived in the
oceans around the Galar region as well.

name: remoraid
flavor_text_entries:
Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a
Mantine’s underside to scavenge for leftovers.

name: octillery
flavor_text_entries:
It traps enemies with its suction-cupped
tentacles, then smashes them with its
rock-hard head.

name: delibird
flavor_text_entries:
It has a generous habit of sharing its food with
people and Pokémon, so it’s always scrounging
around for more food.

name: mantine
flavor_text_entries:
As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if
Remoraid attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.

name: skarmory
flavor_text_entries:
People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed
feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element
in heraldic designs.

name: houndour
flavor_text_entries:
They make repeated eerie howls before dawn
to call attention to their pack.

name: houndoom
flavor_text_entries:
Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long
time ago thought it was the grim reaper and
feared it.

name: kingdra
flavor_text_entries:
Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a
splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been
given to royalty as gifts.

name: phanpy
flavor_text_entries:
Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others
gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water.
These Pokémon can be seen drying their soaking-wet
bodies at the edge of water.

name: donphan
flavor_text_entries:
If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house
could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon
helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.

name: porygon2
flavor_text_entries:
After artificial intelligence was implemented in
Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange
language that only other Porygon2 understand.

name: stantler
flavor_text_entries:
Stantler’s magnificent antlers were traded at high prices as
works of art. As a result, this Pokémon was hunted close to
extinction by those who were after the priceless antlers.

name: smeargle
flavor_text_entries:
It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from
the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol,
Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

name: tyrogue
flavor_text_entries:
Even though it is small, it can’t be ignored because
it will slug any handy target without warning.

name: hitmontop
flavor_text_entries:
After doing a handstand to throw off the
opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.

name: smoochum
flavor_text_entries:
Highly perceptive sensors, Smoochum’s lips are
kept moist by its daily application of tree sap.

name: elekid
flavor_text_entries:
When its horns shine a bluish white, that’s the
sign it’s fully charged. You’ll get a shocking
jolt if you touch it!

name: magby
flavor_text_entries:
Its body temperature is always around 1,100
degrees Fahrenheit. If Magby falls into a small-
enough pond, the whole thing will dry up.

name: miltank
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon needs to be milked every day,
or else it will fall ill. The flavor of Miltank milk
changes with the seasons.

name: blissey
flavor_text_entries:
Blissey lays mysterious eggs that are filled with
happiness. It’s said that anyone who eats a
Blissey egg will start acting kindly to all others.

name: raikou
flavor_text_entries:
Raikou embodies the speed of lightning. The roars of
this Pokémon send shock waves shuddering through the
air and shake the ground as if lightning bolts had come
crashing down.

name: entei
flavor_text_entries:
Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is
thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano.
It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all
that they touch.

name: suicune
flavor_text_entries:
Suicune embodies the compassion of a pure spring of water.
It runs across the land with gracefulness. This Pokémon has
the power to purify dirty water.

name: larvitar
flavor_text_entries:
It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large
mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

name: pupitar
flavor_text_entries:
It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa.
It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.

name: tyranitar
flavor_text_entries:
The quakes caused when it walks make even
great mountains crumble and change
the surrounding terrain.

name: lugia
flavor_text_entries:
Lugia’s wings pack devastating power—a light fluttering of its
wings can blow apart regular houses. As a result, this
Pokémon chooses to live out of sight deep under the sea.

name: ho-oh
flavor_text_entries:
Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle
at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to
bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at
the foot of a rainbow.

name: celebi
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon traveled through time to come
from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with
its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.

name: treecko
flavor_text_entries:
Treecko is cool, calm, and collected—it never panics under
any situation. If a bigger foe were to glare at this Pokémon,
it would glare right back without conceding an inch of ground.

name: grovyle
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees.
In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing
Grovyle however fast they may be.

name: sceptile
flavor_text_entries:
Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be
bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon
raises the trees in a forest with loving care.

name: torchic
flavor_text_entries:
Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame.
Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is
covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

name: combusken
flavor_text_entries:
Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from
its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This
Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.

name: blaziken
flavor_text_entries:
Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a
30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches
leave its foes scorched and blackened.

name: mudkip
flavor_text_entries:
In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is
faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokémon will unleash
its amazing power—it can crush rocks bigger than itself.

name: marshtomp
flavor_text_entries:
Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at
swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious
development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.

name: swampert
flavor_text_entries:
Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the
sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is
approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.

name: poochyena
flavor_text_entries:
Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishing
feature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. This
Pokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on its
tail bristle out.

name: mightyena
flavor_text_entries:
Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory
of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only
those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.

name: zigzagoon
flavor_text_entries:
Zigzagoon that adapted to regions outside
Galar acquired this appearance. If you’ve lost
something, this Pokémon can likely find it.

name: linoone
flavor_text_entries:
This very aggressive Pokémon will recklessly
challenge opponents stronger than itself.

name: wurmple
flavor_text_entries:
Wurmple is targeted by Swellow as prey. This Pokémon
will try to resist by pointing the spikes on its rear at the
attacking predator. It will weaken the foe by leaking poison
from the spikes.

name: silcoon
flavor_text_entries:
Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume
anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought
that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater
that collects on its silk.

name: beautifly
flavor_text_entries:
Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very
convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon
rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

name: cascoon
flavor_text_entries:
If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it
may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body
would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not
forget the pain it endured.

name: dustox
flavor_text_entries:
When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over.
This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a
pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its
antennae like radar.

name: lotad
flavor_text_entries:
Its leaf grew too large for it to live on land.
That is how it began to live floating in the water.

name: lombre
flavor_text_entries:
It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny.
It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and
becomes active at night.

name: ludicolo
flavor_text_entries:
If it hears festive music, it begins moving in
rhythm in order to amplify its power.

name: seedot
flavor_text_entries:
It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of
its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

name: nuzleaf
flavor_text_entries:
They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound
of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.

name: shiftry
flavor_text_entries:
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to
create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

name: taillow
flavor_text_entries:
Taillow is young—it has only just left its nest. As a result,
it sometimes becomes lonesome and cries at night.
This Pokémon feeds on Wurmple that live in forests.

name: swellow
flavor_text_entries:
Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy
wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take
care of cleaning each other’s wings.

name: wingull
flavor_text_entries:
It soars on updrafts without flapping its wings.
It makes a nest on sheer cliffs at the sea’s edge.

name: pelipper
flavor_text_entries:
Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill
in the sea, scoops up food and water, and
carries it.

name: ralts
flavor_text_entries:
If its horns capture the warm feelings of people
or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.

name: kirlia
flavor_text_entries:
It has a psychic power that enables it to distort
the space around it and see into the future.

name: gardevoir
flavor_text_entries:
To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic
power to create a small black hole.

name: surskit
flavor_text_entries:
It lives in ponds and marshes that feature lots
of plant life. It often fights with Dewpider,
whose habitat and diet are similar.

name: masquerain
flavor_text_entries:
Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent.
It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.

name: shroomish
flavor_text_entries:
If Shroomish senses danger, it shakes its body and scatters
spores from the top of its head. This Pokémon’s spores are
so toxic, they make trees and weeds wilt.

name: breloom
flavor_text_entries:
The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic
spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this
Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.

name: slakoth
flavor_text_entries:
Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens,
it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this
Pokémon in motion.

name: vigoroth
flavor_text_entries:
Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it
tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling
this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can
settle down.

name: slaking
flavor_text_entries:
Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear
in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all
the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.

name: nincada
flavor_text_entries:
It can sometimes live underground for more than
10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots
of trees.

name: ninjask
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to
avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

name: shedinja
flavor_text_entries:
A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its
wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does
not breathe.

name: whismur
flavor_text_entries:
When Whismur cries, the sound of its own voice
startles it, making the Pokémon cry even louder.
It cries until it’s exhausted, then it falls asleep.

name: loudred
flavor_text_entries:
The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just
the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that
blows opponents away and damages them.

name: exploud
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To
communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all
sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.

name: makuhita
flavor_text_entries:
There’s a rumor of a traditional recipe for stew
that Trainers can use to raise strong Makuhita.

name: hariyama
flavor_text_entries:
Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily
strong. There are some small ones that move
nimbly and use moves skillfully.

name: azurill
flavor_text_entries:
Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry
one will swing around the big ball on its tail and
try to smash its opponents.

name: nosepass
flavor_text_entries:
It hunts without twitching a muscle by pulling in
its prey with powerful magnetism. But
sometimes it pulls natural enemies in close.

name: skitty
flavor_text_entries:
Skitty is known to chase around playfully after its own tail.
In the wild, this Pokémon lives in holes in the trees of forests.
It is very popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

name: delcatty
flavor_text_entries:
Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent
nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon
will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.

name: sableye
flavor_text_entries:
It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its
eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

name: mawile
flavor_text_entries:
It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are
actually steel horns that have been transformed.

name: aron
flavor_text_entries:
Aron has a body of steel. With one all-out charge, this
Pokémon can demolish even a heavy dump truck.
The destroyed dump truck then becomes a handy meal
for the Pokémon.

name: lairon
flavor_text_entries:
Lairon feeds on iron contained in rocks and water. It makes
its nest on mountains where iron ore is buried. As a result,
the Pokémon often clashes with humans mining the iron ore.

name: aggron
flavor_text_entries:
Aggron is protective of its environment. If its mountain is
ravaged by a landslide or a fire, this Pokémon will haul
topsoil to the area, plant trees, and beautifully restore its
own territory.

name: meditite
flavor_text_entries:
Meditite heightens its inner energy through meditation.
It survives on just one berry a day. Minimal eating is another
aspect of this Pokémon’s training.

name: medicham
flavor_text_entries:
Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its
sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers.
This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month
without eating.

name: electrike
flavor_text_entries:
It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks
from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.

name: manectric
flavor_text_entries:
It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest
where lightning has fallen.

name: plusle
flavor_text_entries:
When Plusle is cheering on its partner, it flashes with electric
sparks from all over its body. If its partner loses, this Pokémon
cries loudly.

name: minun
volbeat
flavor_text_entries:
Volbeat’s tail glows like a lightbulb. With other Volbeat,
it uses its tail to draw geometric shapes in the night sky.
This Pokémon loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

name: illumise
flavor_text_entries:
Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in
the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect
from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.

name: roselia
flavor_text_entries:
It uses the different poisons in each hand
separately when it attacks. The stronger its
aroma, the healthier it is.

name: gulpin
flavor_text_entries:
Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and
brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach
contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.

name: swalot
flavor_text_entries:
Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no
matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile
tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.

name: carvanha
flavor_text_entries:
These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful
jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.

name: sharpedo
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea.
Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls
home will be attacked—no exceptions.

name: wailmer
flavor_text_entries:
When it sucks in a large volume of seawater,
it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton
of food daily.

name: wailord
flavor_text_entries:
Its immense size is the reason for its popularity.
Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing
activity in various parts of the world.

name: numel
flavor_text_entries:
Numel stores magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit
within its body. If it gets wet, the magma cools and hardens.
In that event, the Pokémon’s body grows heavy and its
movements become sluggish.

name: camerupt
flavor_text_entries:
The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation
of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma.
This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

name: torkoal
flavor_text_entries:
You find abandoned coal mines full of them.
They dig tirelessly in search of coal.

name: spoink
flavor_text_entries:
Spoink keeps a pearl on top of its head. The pearl functions to
amplify this Pokémon’s psychokinetic powers. It is therefore on
a constant search for a bigger pearl.

name: grumpig
flavor_text_entries:
Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield
its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely.
This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.

name: spinda
flavor_text_entries:
Each Spinda’s spot pattern is different. With its
stumbling movements, it evades opponents’
attacks brilliantly!

name: trapinch
flavor_text_entries:
It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in
wait at the bottom for prey to come
tumbling down.

name: vibrava
flavor_text_entries:
To help make its wings grow, it dissolves
quantities of prey in its digestive juices and
guzzles them down every day.

name: flygon
flavor_text_entries:
It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the
flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.

name: cacnea
flavor_text_entries:
The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and
fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by
wildly swinging its thorny arms.

name: cacturne
flavor_text_entries:
If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night,
Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are
biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become
incapable of moving.

name: swablu
flavor_text_entries:
Swablu loves to make things clean. If it spots something dirty,
it will wipe and polish it with its cottony wings. If its wings
become dirty, this Pokémon finds a stream and showers itself.

name: altaria
flavor_text_entries:
Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton
clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings
and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

name: zangoose
flavor_text_entries:
Zangoose usually stays on all fours, but when angered, it gets
up on its hind legs and extends its claws. This Pokémon shares
a bitter rivalry with Seviper that dates back over generations.

name: seviper
flavor_text_entries:
Seviper’s swordlike tail serves two purposes—it slashes foes
and douses them with secreted poison. This Pokémon will not
give up its long-running blood feud with Zangoose.

name: lunatone
flavor_text_entries:
It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike
40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

name: solrock
flavor_text_entries:
Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is
strong during the daytime. When it spins, its
body shines.

name: barboach
flavor_text_entries:
It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long
whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

name: whiscash
flavor_text_entries:
It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes
near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.

name: corphish
flavor_text_entries:
It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped
to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.

name: crawdaunt
flavor_text_entries:
A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will
crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.

name: baltoy
flavor_text_entries:
It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving,
it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even
when asleep.

name: claydol
flavor_text_entries:
It appears to have been born from clay dolls
made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to
float and move.

name: lileep
flavor_text_entries:
It sticks to rocks with its powerful suckers and
can’t be washed away no matter how rough the
surf gets.

name: cradily
flavor_text_entries:
This carnivorous Pokémon lived in primordial
seas. It catches prey in its eight tentacles and
dissolves them with digestive fluid as it eats.

name: anorith
flavor_text_entries:
This is one kind of primeval bug Pokémon.
With eight wings, it could apparently swim
a lot faster than you’d expect.

name: armaldo
flavor_text_entries:
Armaldo adapted from living in water to living on
land. It has been determined that it is the
ancestor of some bug Pokémon.

name: feebas
flavor_text_entries:
It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is
very hardy and can survive on little water.

name: milotic
flavor_text_entries:
It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty
will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.

name: castform
flavor_text_entries:
Its form changes depending on the weather.
The rougher conditions get, the rougher
Castform’s disposition!

name: kecleon
flavor_text_entries:
Its color changes for concealment and also
when its mood or health changes. The darker
the color, the healthier it is.

name: shuppet
flavor_text_entries:
There’s a proverb that says, “Shun the house
where Shuppet gather in the growing dusk.”

name: banette
flavor_text_entries:
Resentment at being cast off made it spring into
being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy
it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

name: duskull
flavor_text_entries:
Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to
prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

name: dusclops
flavor_text_entries:
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them
into its empty body. What happens inside is
a mystery.

name: tropius
flavor_text_entries:
Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck.
In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.

name: chimecho
flavor_text_entries:
In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or
the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This
Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.

name: absol
flavor_text_entries:
The elderly call it the disaster Pokémon and
detest it, but interest in its power to predict
disasters is on the rise.

name: wynaut
flavor_text_entries:
It tends to move in a pack with others.
They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

name: snorunt
flavor_text_entries:
It can only survive in cold areas. It bounces
happily around, even in environments as cold as
−150 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: glalie
flavor_text_entries:
It can instantly freeze moisture in the
atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

name: spheal
flavor_text_entries:
Spheal always travels by rolling around on its ball-like body.
When the season for ice floes arrives, this Pokémon can be
seen rolling about on ice and crossing the sea.

name: sealeo
flavor_text_entries:
Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its
nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks
the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes
the object or not.

name: walrein
flavor_text_entries:
Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing
icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of
blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

name: clamperl
flavor_text_entries:
Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious.
They can be more than 10 times as costly
as Shellder’s pearls.

name: huntail
flavor_text_entries:
Deep seas are their habitat. According to
tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore,
something unfortunate will happen.

name: gorebyss
flavor_text_entries:
It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The
leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it
becomes food for other Pokémon.

name: relicanth
flavor_text_entries:
The reason it hasn’t changed at all in a hundred
million years is that it’s apparently already a
perfect life-form.

name: luvdisc
flavor_text_entries:
Luvdisc makes its home in coral reefs in warm
seas. It especially likes sleeping in the space
between Corsola’s branches.

name: bagon
flavor_text_entries:
Some theories suggest that its behavior
of forcefully bashing its head into things
stimulates cells that affect its evolution.

name: shelgon
flavor_text_entries:
Shelgon lives deep within caves. It stays shut
up in its hard shell, dreaming of the day it will
be able to fly.

name: salamence
flavor_text_entries:
Thanks to its fervent wishes, the cells in its
body finally mutated, and at last it has its
heart’s desire—wings.

name: beldum
flavor_text_entries:
If you anger it, it will do more than rampage. It
will also burst out strong magnetism, causing
nearby machines to break.

name: metang
flavor_text_entries:
It flies at high speeds around the skies. When it
finds its prey, Metang takes a firm grip with its
sharp claws and never lets go.

name: metagross
flavor_text_entries:
It analyzes its opponents with more accuracy
than a supercomputer, which enables it to
calmly back them into a corner.

name: regirock
flavor_text_entries:
Regirock’s body is composed entirely of rocks. Recently,
a study made the startling discovery that the rocks were all
unearthed from different locations.

name: regice
flavor_text_entries:
Regice cloaks itself with frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
Things will freeze solid just by going near this Pokémon.
Its icy body is so cold, it will not melt even if it is immersed
in magma.

name: registeel
flavor_text_entries:
Registeel was imprisoned by people in ancient times.
The metal composing its body is thought to be a curious
substance that is not of this earth.

name: latias
flavor_text_entries:
Latias is highly intelligent and capable of understanding
human speech. It is covered with a glass-like down.
The Pokémon enfolds its body with its down and refracts
light to alter its appearance.

name: latios
flavor_text_entries:
Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a
compassionate spirit. This Pokémon can fly faster than a
jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.

name: kyogre
flavor_text_entries:
Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself.
Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon,
as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: groudon
flavor_text_entries:
Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power,
it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to
erupt and expand the landmass of the world.

name: rayquaza
flavor_text_entries:
It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming
meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids
in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

name: jirachi
flavor_text_entries:
It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from
its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes
written on the notes attached to its head.

name: deoxys
flavor_text_entries:
Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly
intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon
shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.

name: turtwig
flavor_text_entries:
It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making
oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

name: grotle
flavor_text_entries:
It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow
Pokémon there on its back.

name: torterra
flavor_text_entries:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving
back to begin building their nests.

name: chimchar
flavor_text_entries:
The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end.
The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

name: monferno
flavor_text_entries:
It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks.
Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

name: infernape
flavor_text_entries:
It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all
its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

name: piplup
flavor_text_entries:
Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food
from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: prinplup
flavor_text_entries:
It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows
that can snap even the thickest of trees.

name: empoleon
flavor_text_entries:
The three horns that extend from its beak attest to
its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: starly
flavor_text_entries:
They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy
and annoying.

name: staravia
flavor_text_entries:
It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over
territory occur when flocks collide.

name: staraptor
flavor_text_entries:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the
flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: bidoof
flavor_text_entries:
It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle
down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

name: bibarel
flavor_text_entries:
It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and
mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: kricketot
flavor_text_entries:
When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the
music of a xylophone.

name: kricketune
flavor_text_entries:
It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists
are studying these melodic patterns.

name: shinx
flavor_text_entries:
Electricity makes this Pokémon’s fur glow. Shinx
sends signals to others of its kind by shaking the
tip of its tail while the tail tip is shining brightly.

name: luxio
flavor_text_entries:
Upon encountering an opponent, this Pokémon
prepares for battle by extending its claws, which
can put out 1,000,000 volts of electricity.

name: luxray
flavor_text_entries:
Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of
Luxray’s electricity, so the Pokémon sleeps for
long periods of time to store up energy.

name: budew
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is highly sensitive to temperature
changes. When its bud starts to open, that means
spring is right around the corner.

name: roserade
flavor_text_entries:
The poison in its right hand is quick acting.
The poison in its left hand is slow acting.
Both are life threatening.

name: cranidos
flavor_text_entries:
Its hard skull is its distinguishing feature. It
snapped trees by headbutting them, and then
it fed on their ripe berries.

name: rampardos
flavor_text_entries:
This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully.
Its brain was really small, so some theories
suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.

name: shieldon
flavor_text_entries:
Although its fossils can be found in layers of
primeval rock, nothing but its face has ever
been discovered.

name: bastiodon
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years
ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder
than steel.

name: burmy
flavor_text_entries:
If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes
the cloak with materials nearby.

name: wormadam
flavor_text_entries:
When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of
this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: mothim
flavor_text_entries:
It flutters around at night and steals honey from
the Combee hive.

name: combee
flavor_text_entries:
It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to
sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and
the swarm.

name: vespiquen
flavor_text_entries:
Vespiquen that give off more pheromones
have larger swarms of Combee attendants.

name: pachirisu
flavor_text_entries:
A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches
together in an effort to share stored electricity.

name: buizel
flavor_text_entries:
It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and
pokes its head out of the water to see what is
going on.

name: floatzel
flavor_text_entries:
Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing
aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

name: cherubi
flavor_text_entries:
The deeper a Cherubi’s red, the more nutrients it
has stockpiled in its body. And the sweeter and
tastier its small ball!

name: cherrim
flavor_text_entries:
The faint scent that emanates from its full
blossom entices bug Pokémon to it.

name: shellos
flavor_text_entries:
Subjecting this Pokémon to a strong force
causes it to secrete a strange purple fluid.
Though harmless, the fluid is awfully sticky.

name: gastrodon
flavor_text_entries:
The softness of its body helps disperse the force
of impacts, so although its body is uncommonly
squishy, it’s also surprisingly resilient.

name: ambipom
flavor_text_entries:
It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both
of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze,
that’s proof it really likes you.

name: drifloon
flavor_text_entries:
The gathering of many souls gave rise to this
Pokémon. During humid seasons, they seem to
appear in abundance.

name: drifblim
flavor_text_entries:
It grabs people and Pokémon and carries them
off somewhere. Where do they go?
Nobody knows.

name: buneary
flavor_text_entries:
Buneary can attack by rolling up their ears and
then striking with the force created by unrolling
them. This attack becomes stronger with training.

name: lopunny
flavor_text_entries:
Once hot seasons are over, Lopunny’s coat will
be replaced with fur that holds a lot of insulating
air in preparation for colder weather.

name: mismagius
flavor_text_entries:
Its muttered curses can cause awful headaches
or terrifying visions that torment others.

name: honchkrow
flavor_text_entries:
Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it.
The only time it dirties its own hands is in
delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.

name: glameow
flavor_text_entries:
When it’s happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful
movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

name: purugly
flavor_text_entries:
To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly
cinches its waist with its twin tails.

name: chingling
flavor_text_entries:
There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops,
the orb bounces all over and makes a
ringing sound.

name: stunky
flavor_text_entries:
If it lifts its tail and points its rear at you, beware.
It’s about to spray you with a fluid stinky enough
to make you faint.

name: skuntank
flavor_text_entries:
It digs holes in the ground to make its nest.
The stench of the fluid it lets fly from the tip
of its tail is extremely potent.

name: bronzor
flavor_text_entries:
Polishing Bronzor to a shine makes its surface
reflect the truth, according to common lore.
Be that as it may, Bronzor hates being polished.

name: bronzong
flavor_text_entries:
Many scientists suspect that this Pokémon
originated outside the Galar region, based on
the patterns on its body.

name: bonsly
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon lives in dry, rocky areas. As its
green spheres dry out, their dull luster increases.

name: mime-jr
flavor_text_entries:
It looks for a Mr. Rime that’s a good dancer
and carefully copies the Mr. Rime’s steps
like an apprentice.

name: happiny
flavor_text_entries:
Happiny’s willing to lend its precious round stone
to those it’s friendly with, but if the stone isn’t
returned, Happiny will cry and throw a tantrum.

name: chatot
flavor_text_entries:
It can learn and speak human words. If they gather,
they all learn the same saying.

name: spiritomb
flavor_text_entries:
It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as
punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

name: gible
flavor_text_entries:
Its original home is an area much hotter than
Alola. If you’re planning to live with one, your
heating bill will soar.

name: gabite
flavor_text_entries:
It sheds its skin and gradually grows larger. Its
scales can be ground into a powder and used
as raw materials for traditional medicine.

name: garchomp
flavor_text_entries:
Its fine scales don’t just reduce wind
resistance—their sharp edges also cause injury
to any opponent who attacks it.

name: munchlax
flavor_text_entries:
It stores food beneath its fur. It might share
just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.

name: riolu
flavor_text_entries:
It can use waves called auras to gauge how
others are feeling. These same waves can also tell
this Pokémon about the state of the environment.

name: lucario
flavor_text_entries:
It can tell what people are thinking. Only Trainers
who have justice in their hearts can earn this
Pokémon’s trust.

name: hippopotas
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is active during the day and passes
the cold desert nights burrowed snugly into
the sand.

name: hippowdon
flavor_text_entries:
When roused to violence by its rage, it spews out
the quantities of sand it has swallowed and
whips up a sandstorm.

name: skorupi
flavor_text_entries:
It attacks using the claws on its tail. Once locked
in its grip, its prey is unable to move as this
Pokémon’s poison seeps in.

name: drapion
flavor_text_entries:
It’s so vicious that it’s called the Sand Demon.
Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion
keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.

name: croagunk
flavor_text_entries:
Once diluted, its poison becomes medicinal.
This Pokémon came into popularity after a
pharmaceutical company chose it as a mascot.

name: toxicroak
flavor_text_entries:
It booms out a victory croak when its prey
goes down in defeat. This Pokémon and
Seismitoad are related species.

name: carnivine
flavor_text_entries:
It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey
with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

name: finneon
flavor_text_entries:
It lures in prey with its shining tail fins. It stays
near the surface during the day and moves to
the depths when night falls.

name: lumineon
flavor_text_entries:
They traverse the deep waters as if crawling
over the seafloor. The fantastic lights of its
fins shine like stars in the night sky.

name: mantyke
flavor_text_entries:
It swims along with a school of Remoraid, and
they’ll all fight together to repel attackers.

name: snover
flavor_text_entries:
The berries that grow around its belly are like
ice pops. Galarian Darumaka absolutely love
these berries.

name: abomasnow
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is known to bring blizzards.
A shake of its massive body is enough to
cause whiteout conditions.

name: weavile
flavor_text_entries:
With its claws, it leaves behind signs for its
friends to find. The number of distinct signs
is said to be over 500.

name: magnezone
flavor_text_entries:
It’s thought that a special magnetic field changed
the molecular structure of this Pokémon’s body,
and that’s what caused the Pokémon’s evolution.

name: lickilicky
flavor_text_entries:
Lickilicky can do just about anything with its
tongue, which is as dexterous as the human hand.
In contrast, Lickilicky’s use of its fingers is clumsy.

name: rhyperior
flavor_text_entries:
It relies on its carapace to deflect incoming
attacks and throw its enemy off balance. As soon
as that happens, it drives its drill into the foe.

name: tangrowth
flavor_text_entries:
Vine growth is accelerated for Tangrowth living in
warm climates. If the vines grow long, Tangrowth
shortens them by tearing parts of them off.

name: electivire
flavor_text_entries:
A single Electivire can provide enough electricity
for all the buildings in a big city for a year.

name: magmortar
flavor_text_entries:
Magmortar takes down its enemies by shooting
fireballs, which burn them to a blackened crisp.
It avoids this method when hunting prey.

name: togekiss
flavor_text_entries:
Known as a bringer of blessings, it’s
been depicted on good-luck charms
since ancient times.

name: yanmega
flavor_text_entries:
This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of
transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail
help it stay balanced.

name: leafeon
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon’s tail is blade sharp, with a
fantastic cutting edge that can slice right
though large trees.

name: glaceon
flavor_text_entries:
The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes
powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular
Pokémon at ski resorts.

name: gliscor
flavor_text_entries:
Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to
carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do
the rest.

name: mamoswine
flavor_text_entries:
It looks strong, and that’s exactly what it is.
As the weather grows colder, its ice tusks
grow longer, thicker, and more impressive.

name: porygon-z
flavor_text_entries:
Some say an additional program made this
Pokémon evolve, but even academics can’t agree
on whether Porygon-Z is really an evolution.

name: gallade
flavor_text_entries:
Sharply attuned to others’ wishes for help, this
Pokémon seeks out those in need and aids them
in battle.

name: probopass
flavor_text_entries:
It uses three small units to catch prey and
battle enemies. The main body mostly just
gives orders.

name: dusknoir
flavor_text_entries:
With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its
target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten—
Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.

name: froslass
flavor_text_entries:
It spits out cold air of nearly −60 degrees
Fahrenheit to freeze its quarry. It brings frozen
prey back to its lair and neatly lines them up.

name: rotom
flavor_text_entries:
With a body made of plasma, it can inhabit all
sorts of machines. It loves to surprise others.

name: uxie
flavor_text_entries:
It is said that its emergence gave humans the
intelligence to improve their quality of life.

name: mesprit
flavor_text_entries:
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to
leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.

name: azelf
flavor_text_entries:
It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came
from the same egg.

name: dialga
flavor_text_entries:
It has the power to control time. It appears in
Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

name: palkia
flavor_text_entries:
It has the ability to distort space. It is described as
a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

name: heatran
flavor_text_entries:
Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its
body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

name: regigigas
flavor_text_entries:
There is an enduring legend that states this
Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

name: giratina
flavor_text_entries:
It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed
upon the old world from the Distortion World.

name: cresselia
flavor_text_entries:
Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are
assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent
the crescent moon.

name: phione
flavor_text_entries:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

name: manaphy
flavor_text_entries:
It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits
it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: darkrai
flavor_text_entries:
It can lull people to sleep and make them dream.
It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: shaymin
flavor_text_entries:
The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the
power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are
the message it delivers.

name: arceus
flavor_text_entries:
It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born
before the universe even existed.

name: victini
flavor_text_entries:
When it shares the infinite energy it creates,
that being’s entire body will be overflowing
with power.

name: snivy
flavor_text_entries:
They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in
sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their
tails droop.

name: servine
flavor_text_entries:
When it gets dirty, its leaves can’t be used in
photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

name: serperior
flavor_text_entries:
It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a
glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts
it internally.

name: tepig
flavor_text_entries:
It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it
gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

name: pignite
flavor_text_entries:
When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow
sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

name: emboar
flavor_text_entries:
It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves.
It grows a beard of fire.

name: oshawott
flavor_text_entries:
It fights using the scalchop on its stomach.
In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately
by slashing.

name: dewott
flavor_text_entries:
As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns
different forms for using the scalchops.

name: samurott
flavor_text_entries:
One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor
can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of
them quiets everybody.

name: patrat
flavor_text_entries:
Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on
the lookout, but it won’t notice a foe coming
from behind.

name: watchog
flavor_text_entries:
When they see an enemy, their tails stand high,
and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their
cheek pouches.

name: lillipup
flavor_text_entries:
This Pokémon is far brighter than the average
child, and Lillipup won’t forget the love it
